text: With July around the corner, Netflix subscribers will see a number of beloved shows and movies as well as some new comedy specials returning for their viewing pleasure. Most notably, fan - favorite Netflix original series “ Orange Is the New Black ” is returning on July 27 for Season 6 and “ Shameless ” will be uploading its eight season the day after. On July 1, the entire “ Jurassic Park ” trilogy will be available for fans to stream, along with “ The Boondock Saints, ” “ The Princess Diaries, ” and “ Happy Gilmore. ” Netflix ’ s July lineup also promises plenty of opportunities for laughs, with “ Jim Jefferies : This Is Me Now ” and “ The Comedy Lineup ” becoming available for streaming.
